founders.name: Anda Penka
founders.background_summary: Anda Penka is the Co-Founder of Fermentful, a food-tech company specializing in fermented plant-based drinks made from green buckwheat, aimed at improving daily gut health. With an MBA in Innovation and Entrepreneurship and a background in Materials Technology and Design, Anda has been leading Fermentful for five years. Her prior experience includes nearly seven years as Creative Director at CAPS! Chocolate, where she handled marketing strategy, market research, and trend analysis, and over three years as Marketing & Sales Manager at NARCISS, focusing on sales, brand building, and PR. This background demonstrates a strong foundation in brand development, marketing, and sales within consumer goods. Anda's recent LinkedIn content centers on Fermentful's growth, mission, and engagement within the startup ecosystem, highlighting milestones and a clear focus on food-tech and gut health.

previous_companies.description: Co-founded and leads a food-tech company specializing in fermented plant-based drinks for gut health.
Handled marketing strategy, market research, and trend analysis for a consumer chocolate brand.
Focused on sales, brand building, and PR for a consumer goods company.

public_speaking_or_content.title: Impact Days - Gut Health and Food as Medicine
Fermentful Launch in BILLA PLUS Stores Austria

investment_criteria_assessment.assessment_summary: Anda Penka is a strong founder candidate with a clear focus in food-tech and brand building. Her mission aligns well with health and impact-driven goals. She offers an exciting solution addressing gut health with a founder-led perspective. While Fermentful is her first founded company, her extensive relevant experience in marketing and brand roles, combined with an MBA and strategic market execution, demonstrate strong potential and intelligence.
